name: CityofBeverlyHills
0:
”Alexa, Open City of Beverly Hills”
”Alexa, Ask City of Beverly Hills what are the featured news?”
”Alexa, Ask City of Beverly Hills what are the upcoming events?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: city of beverly hills
Developer Terms of Use
des: City of Beverly Hills skill provides information on Beverly Hills events, attractions and meetings in addition to playing recorded audio of City Council meetings and Commission meetings and featured videos of Beverly Hills, CA.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
